snippet: Four people were taken to hospitals for minor injuries and another person refused treatment at the scene, officials said.
abstract: Guest at wedding reception in Manhattan's Waldorf Astoria Hotel accidentally discharges a gun in the hotel's lobby, injuring five people; police officials describe all injuries as minor and say three people have been questioned in incident.
lead_paragraph: Four people were taken to hospitals for minor injuries and another person refused treatment at the scene, officials said.

headline.main: Man Discharges Gun at Waldorf Wedding Reception, Injuring 5
headline.print_headline: Five Injured at Wedding at Waldorf

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Waldorf Astoria New York (Manhattan, NY, Hotel)
